Interview Prep Site - Functionality Test

Test Instructions

  1. Search Input Test:
    • Check if search input is visible in the navbar
    • Type "Pulumi" in the search box
    • Verify that matching sections are highlighted
    • Press Enter to navigate through matches
    • Click the clear button (X) to clear search
  2. Dark Mode Test:
    • Click the moon/sun icon in the navbar
    • Verify that the entire page changes to dark theme
    • Check that all text is readable
    • Verify code blocks have appropriate dark syntax highlighting
    • Toggle back to light mode and verify it works
